materials.raw_text:
Bismuth Trioxide (Bi2O3) - 150 g 
 Cesium Carbonate (Cs2CO3) - 90 g 
 Tungsten Oxide (WO3) - 60 g 
 Distilled Water - 50 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth Trioxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers. 
 Cesium Carbonate: Specialty chemical suppliers or online. 
 Tungsten Oxide: Chemical supply stores or online. 
 Distilled Water: Supermarkets or laboratory supply stores.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 150 g of Bismuth Trioxide and place in a clean mixing container. 
 2. Add 90 g of Cesium Carbonate to the container. 
 3. Measure 60 g of Tungsten Oxide and add it to the mixture. 
 4. Slowly add 50 g of distilled water to the dry ingredients while stirring continuously to form a homogeneous slurry. 
 5. Mix thoroughly until a uniform consistency is achieved.
